info.title: Desa Cantik API
info.description:
API documentation for Desa Cantik App backend

**NOTE:** after `blokI`, the route is `+1` from the database. For example: `blokII` in the database is `blokIII` in route to fit in the frontend.

get.description: Get user authentication from token (cookie) (its not working yet in this docs)

401.description: Authentication failed due to missing or invalid token

patch.description: Updates the password of a user with the given ID after validating the old password.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the user whose password is to be updated

oldPassword.description: The current password of the user

password.description: The new password to be set

get.summary: Check if a user is allowed to access a form
get.description: Checks if a user is allowed to access a form based on the form ID and user ID.

parameters.name: idForm
parameters.description: ID of the form to be accessed

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: ID of the user trying to access the form

200.description: User is allowed to access the form

get.description: Fetches aggregated survey data based on various parameters and visualizes it.

parameters.name: surveyPeriodId
parameters.description: The ID of the survey period.

parameters.name: desa
parameters.description: If Not null then the data will be aggregated by village.

parameters.name: dusun
parameters.description: The name of the hamlet. `null` if not applicable.

parameters.name: rt
parameters.description: The neighborhood association. `null` if not applicable.

parameters.name: rw
parameters.description: The community association. `null` if not applicable.

400.description: Bad Request - Missing or invalid parameters

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

404.description: Not Found - Survey Period ID not found

post.summary: Request password reset and send email with reset token

400.description: Token is invalid or has expired

message.example: Token is invalid or has expired

post.description: Authenticate a user and return a JWT token if the credentials are correct.

200.description: Login successful and JWT token issued

post.description: Logout the user by removing the JWT token cookie.

get.description: Fetch user forms and their status metrics for a specified survey period. Requires Admin role.

parameters.name: surveyPeriodId
parameters.description: ID of the survey period to filter the forms.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: ID of the specific user to filter by. If not provided, metrics for all `Pencacah` users are returned.

200.description: Successful retrieval of user forms metrics

400.description: Bad Request - Missing or invalid parameters

401.description: Unauthorized - User does not have Admin role

get.summary: Retrieve metrics for Verifikators and their supervised Pencacahs
get.description: Fetch metrics for Verifikators and their supervised Pencacahs based on a survey period. Requires Admin role.

parameters.name: surveyPeriodId
parameters.description: ID of the survey period to filter the forms.

parameters.name: verifikatorId
parameters.description: ID of the specific Verifikator to filter by. If not provided, metrics for all Verifikators are returned.

400.description: Bad Request - Missing or invalid parameters

401.description: Unauthorized - User does not have Admin role

get.description: Fetch survey periods based on optional filters for start and end dates and verification status.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: If true, filter for periods with start date less than or equal to the current date.

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: If true, filter for periods with end date less than or equal to the current date.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by verification status. 1 for verified, 0 for not verified.

post.description: Create a new survey period with the provided name, start date, and end date. Requires Admin role.

401.description: Unauthorized - User does not have Admin role

delete.description: Delete a survey period by its ID. This will also delete associated forms and their images. Requires Admin role.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the survey period to delete.

200.description: Successful deletion of survey period and associated data

message.example: Survey period and associated data deleted successfully

401.description: Unauthorized - User does not have Admin role

404.description: Not Found - Survey period not found

500.description: Internal Server Error - Error deleting survey period or images

get.description: Fetch all survey periods, ordered by start date. Requires Admin role.

200.description: Successful retrieval of all survey periods

401.description: Unauthorized - User does not have Admin role

get.description: Fetch all survey periods, ordered by start date. Requires API key authentication.

200.description: Successful retrieval of all survey periods

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

get.summary: Download survey data individu in CSV format
get.description: Fetch and download survey data individu for a specific survey period as a CSV file. Requires authentication with a bearer token or API key.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the survey period for which data is to be downloaded.

400.description: Bad Request - Missing or invalid surveyPeriodId parameter

500.description: Internal Server Error - Error generating CSV

get.summary: Download aggregated individual data in CSV format
get.description: Downloads aggregated individual data for a given survey period in CSV format.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the survey period.

200.description: CSV file containing the aggregated individual data.

400.description: Bad request if surveyPeriodId is missing or invalid.

401.description: Unauthorized if the user does not have the correct role or access rights.

404.description: Not found if no data is available for the given survey period.

500.description: Internal server error if something goes wrong during CSV generation.

get.description: Generates a CSV file containing aggregated data for a specific survey period.

schema.description: The ID of the survey period for which data is to be exported.

400.description: Bad Request. surveyPeriodId parameter is missing or invalid.

401.description: Unauthorized. Invalid or missing authentication token.

404.description: Not Found. SurveyPeriod not found for the provided ID.

500.description: Internal Server Error. An error occurred while generating the CSV file.

get.description: Retrieves the profile information for a specific user by ID.

200.description: Successful response with user profile information.

400.description: Bad Request. Invalid or missing ID parameter.

401.description: Unauthorized. Invalid or missing authentication token.

404.description: Not Found. User not found for the provided ID.

500.description: Internal Server Error. An error occurred while retrieving the user profile.

post.description: Creates a new user with the provided details. An email will be sent to the user with their credentials.

name.description: The full name of the user.

noHp.description: The phone number of the user.

email.description: The email address of the user.

id_pengawas.description: The supervisor ID, nullable for `Verifikator` role.

beban_kerja.description: The workload of the user, nullable for `Verifikator` role.

200.description: Successful response with the created user details.

401.description: Unauthorized. Invalid or missing authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error. An error occurred while creating the user.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all users except those with the `Admin` role.

200.description: Successful response with a list of users.

401.description: Unauthorized. Only Admin can access this endpoint.

500.description: Internal Server Error. An error occurred while retrieving the list of users.

patch.description: Updates the details of an existing user by ID. Only accessible by Admin users.

schema.description: The ID of the user to be updated.

name.description: The full name of the user.

noHp.description: The phone number of the user.

email.description: The email address of the user.

id_pengawas.description: The supervisor ID, nullable for `Verifikator` role.

beban_kerja.description: The workload of the user, nullable for `Verifikator` role.

is_active.description: The activation status of the user.

200.description: Successful response with the updated user details.

400.description: Bad Request. Invalid or missing ID parameter.

401.description: Unauthorized. Only Admin can access this endpoint.

500.description: Internal Server Error. An error occurred while updating the user.

patch.description: Updates the `is_active` status of a user by ID. Only accessible by Admin users.

id.description: The ID of the user whose status is to be updated.

is_active.description: The new status of the user. `true` for active, `false` for inactive.

200.description: Successful response with the updated user details.

400.description: Bad Request. Invalid or missing parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized. Only Admin can access this endpoint.

500.description: Internal Server Error. An error occurred while updating the user status.

get.description: Fetches forms managed by a verifier identified by `id_pengawas`. Optionally filters by `idSurvey`.

schema.description: Optional. The ID of the survey period to filter forms.

200.description: Successful response with the list of forms managed by the verifier.

401.description: Unauthorized. Only Verifikator role users can access this endpoint.

500.description: Internal Server Error. An error occurred while retrieving the forms.

post.description: Creates a new form with the provided user ID and survey period ID.

userId.description: ID of the user creating the form.

get.description: Retrieves forms for a given survey period ID and includes form details.

delete.description: Deletes a form by ID and associated images.

patch.description: Updates the status of a form to `DIKIRIM_ULANG`. Requires `Pencacah` role.

schema.description: ID of the form to be updated.

message.example: Form berhasil diedit dan dikirim ulang ke verifikator

get.description: Retrieves the details of a specific form by its ID. Requires `Pencacah` role.

schema.description: ID of the form to be retrieved.

patch.description: Updates the status and comment of a form. Requires `Verifikator` role.

schema.description: ID of the form to be updated.

comment.description: Comment related to the status update.

get.summary: Retrieve forms for a specific user
get.description: Fetches forms associated with a specific user ID. Optionally, the results can be filtered by survey period ID.

schema.description: ID of the user whose forms are to be retrieved.
ID of the survey period to filter the forms.

updated_at.description: Last update timestamp of the form.

userId.description: ID of the user who created the form.

surveyPeriodId.description: ID of the survey period associated with the form.

namaKK.description: Name from Blok II, if available.

emptyBlocksMessage.description: Message indicating which blocks are empty, if any.

get.description: Fetches a form based on the provided form ID. Access is restricted based on user roles and authentication.

schema.description: ID of the form to retrieve.

updated_at.description: Last update timestamp of the form.

userId.description: ID of the user who created the form.

surveyPeriodId.description: ID of the survey period associated with the form.

post.description: Creates a new BlokI record with the provided details.

formId.description: ID of the form associated with the BlokI record.

patch.description: Updates an existing BlokI record with the provided details.

formId.description: ID of the form associated with the BlokI record.

post.description: Creates a new BlokIII record with the provided details.

formId.description: ID of the form associated with the BlokIII record.

is_under_four.description: Indicates if the individual is under four years old.

patch.description: Updates an existing BlokIII record with the provided details.

formId.description: ID of the form associated with the BlokIII record.

is_under_four.description: Indicates if the individual is under four years old.

patch.description: Update BlokIV data. The response is referenced from BlokIII schema.

requestBody.description: Data to create a new BlokIV entry
Data to update an existing BlokIV entry
Data to create a new BlokVI entry
Data to update an existing BlokVI entry
Data to create a new BlokVII entry
Data to update an existing BlokVII entry
Data to create a new BlokVIII entry
Data to update an existing BlokVIII entry

SurveyPeriod.description: A model representing a Survey Period to collect a data

Form.description: A model representing a Form application (kuesioner sent by user)

password.description: User's password (will be hashed by the server before storage)

User.description: A model representing a User application

BlokI.description: A model representing Blok I data (Keterangan Tempat).

kondisi_fisik.example: Disabilitas Tunarungu, Disabilitas Tunawicara, Disabilitas Tunanetra, Disabilitas Tunadaksa, Disabilitas Mental, Disabilitas Intelektual, Gangguan Jiwa
kondisi_fisik.description: Kondisi fisik yang dimiliki oleh responden (bisa banyak dipisahkan oleh koma)

kartu_identitas.example: Akta Kelahiran, KTP, Kartu Identitas Anak (KIA), KK
kartu_identitas.description: Kartu identitas yang dimiliki oleh responden (bisa banyak dipisahkan oleh koma)

jaminan_kesehatan.description: Jaminan kesehatan yang dimiliki oleh responden (bisa banyak dipisahkan oleh koma)

penyakit_kronis.example: Asma, Jantung, Diabetes, TBC, Stroke, Kanker/Tumor, Gagal_ginjal, HIV/AIDS, Lainnya
penyakit_kronis.description: Penyakit kronis yang dimiliki oleh responden (bisa banyak dipisahkan oleh koma)

BlokII.description: A model representing Blok II data (Informasi Rinci Anggota Keluarga). The combination of `formId` and `order` must be unique.

BlokIII.description: A model representing Blok III data (Kondisi Rumah).

rumah_lain.description: Rumah lain yang dimiliki oleh responden

BlokIV.description: A model representing Blok IV data (Kepemilikan Asset).

luas_lahan.description: Luas lahan yang dimiliki oleh responden (kosong jika is_lahan = false)

pemanfaatan_lahan.description: Pemanfaatan lahan yang dimiliki oleh responden (bisa banyak dipisahkan oleh koma) (kosong jika is_lahan = false)

BlokV.description: A model representing Blok V data (Kepemilikan Lahan).

nama_pemilik.description: Nama pemilik usaha (kosong jika is_usaha = false)

jumlah_pekerja.description: Jumlah pekerja yang bekerja di usaha (kosong jika is_usaha = false)

omzet_usaha.description: Omzet usaha per bulan (kosong jika is_usaha = false)

BlokVI.description: A model representing Blok VI data (Usaha).

BlokVII.description: A model representing Blok VII data (Catatan).

aggregateddataindividu.description: A view to agregate individual data from blok I and blok II

surveyPeriodId.description: Foeign key for the survey period.

total_milik_sendiri.description: Total ownership of property by self.

total_shm_sendiri.description: Total properties with SHM owned by self.

total_shm_anggota_keluarga.description: Total properties with SHM owned by family members.

total_shm_bukan_anggota_keluarga.description: Total properties with SHM owned by non-family members.

total_marmer_granit.description: Total properties with marble or granite flooring.

total_plester_semen.description: Total properties with cement plaster flooring.

total_lainnya_lantai_terluas.description: Total properties with other types of flooring.

total_kayu_papan.description: Total properties with wooden plank construction.

total_anyaman_bambu.description: Total properties with bamboo woven construction.

total_gypsum_grc_caliciboard.description: Total properties with gypsum or GRC board construction.

total_lainnya_dinding_terluas.description: Total properties with other types of wall construction.

total_jerami_atau_ijuk.description: Total properties with straw or palm fiber roofing.

total_lainnya_atap_terluas.description: Total properties with other types of roofing.

total_jamban_sendiri.description: Total properties with own toilet facilities.

total_jamban_numpang.description: Total properties with shared toilet facilities.

total_Lebih_dari_2200_watt.description: Total properties with more than 2200-watt electricity.

total_air_kemasan_bermerek.description: Total properties using branded bottled water.

total_sumur_bor_atau_pompa.description: Total properties using bore wells or pumps.

total_sungai_atau_irigasi.description: Total properties using river or irrigation water.

total_pdam_atau_leding.description: Total properties using other sources of drinking water.

total_gas_3_kg.description: Total properties with 3 kg gas cylinders.

total_gas_5_5_kg.description: Total properties with 5.5 kg gas cylinders.

total_gas_12_kg.description: Total properties with 12 kg gas cylinders.

total_bahan_bakar_lainnya.description: Total properties using other types of fuel.

total_menerima_bansos_bnpt_pos.description: Total properties receiving BNPT POS social assistance.

total_tidak_menerima_bansos_bnpt_pos.description: Total properties not receiving BNPT POS social assistance.

total_tidak_menerima_pip.description: Total properties not receiving PIP assistance.

agregateddatakeluarga.description: A view to agregate family data from blok blok I, III, IV, V, and VI,
